name: Bias Detector
description: Detects potential bias and assumptions in specifications that may not be stated explicitly

name: Performance Validator
description: Validates that performance specifications are realistic and internally consistent

name: Security Validator
description: Validates security requirements and identifies potential security gaps

name: Scalability Checker
description: Checks scalability requirements and suggests patterns for high-load scenarios

name: Compliance Checker
description: Verifies specifications meet regulatory and compliance standards (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2)

name: Accessibility Analyzer
description: Checks accessibility requirements and suggests improvements for inclusive design
